[F19:137]|   useEffect(() => {

[F19:151]| 
[F19:152]|   const handleStartTimer = useCallback(() => {

[F22:2]| 
[F22:3]| interface CollapseButtonProps {
[F22:4]|   pendingTasks: number;
[F22:5]|   isTimerRunning: boolean;
[F22:6]|   timerMode: 'work' | 'break' | 'longBreak' | 'idle';
[F22:7]|   formattedTime: string;
[F22:8]|   activeTaskId: string | null;
[F22:9]|   taskTitle: string;

[F22:15]| 
[F22:16]| export function CollapseButton({
[F22:17]|   pendingTasks,
[F22:18]|   isTimerRunning,
[F22:19]|   timerMode,
[F22:20]|   formattedTime,
[F22:21]|   activeTaskId: _activeTaskId,
[F22:22]|   taskTitle,
[F22:23]|   onStart,
[F22:24]|   onPause,
[F22:25]|   onResume,
[F22:26]|   onExpand,
[F22:27]| }: CollapseButtonProps) {
[F22:28]|   void _activeTaskId; // é¢„ç•™å‚æ•°
[F22:29]|   const getModeColor = () => {
[F22:30]|     if (isTimerRunning) {
[F22:31]|       switch (timerMode) {
[F22:32]|         case 'work':
[F22:33]|           return '#3b82f6';
[F22:34]|         case 'break':
[F22:35]|           return '#22c55e';
[F22:36]|         case 'longBreak':
[F22:37]|           return '#8b5cf6';
[F22:38]|         default:
[F22:39]|           return '#6366f1';
[F22:40]|       }
[F22:41]|     }
[F22:42]|     return '#6366f1';
[F22:43]|   };
[F22:44]| 
[F22:45]|   const handleTimerAction = (e: React.MouseEvent) => {
[F22:46]|     e.stopPropagation();
[F22:47]| 
[F22:48]|     if (isTimerRunning) {
[F22:49]|       onPause();
[F22:50]|     } else if (timerMode !== 'idle' && onResume) {
[F22:51]|       onResume();
[F22:52]|     } else {
[F22:53]|       onStart();
[F22:54]|     }
[F22:55]|   };
[F22:56]| 
[F22:57]|   return (
[F22:58]|     <div
[F22:59]|       className="collapse-float"
[F22:60]|       data-tauri-drag-region
[F22:61]|       style={{
[F22:62]|         position: 'absolute',

[F22:64]|         width: '100%',

[F22:66]|         left: 0,
[F22:67]|         top: 0,
[F22:68]|         transform: 'none',
[F22:69]|         '--accent-color': getModeColor(),
[F22:70]|       } as React.CSSProperties}
[F22:71]|       onDoubleClick={(e) => {

[F22:73]|         onExpand();
[F22:74]|       }}

[F22:76]|       {/* å±•å¼€æç¤º */}

[F22:78]|         <ChevronUp size={12} />
[F22:79]|       </div>
[F22:80]| 
[F22:81]|       {/* å·¦ä¾§ï¼šä»»åŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯ */}

[F22:84]|           {taskTitle}

[F24:69]| export function FloatWindow({ children, onCollapse }: FloatWindowProps) {

[F24:71]|   const containerRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
[F24:72]| 
[F24:73]|   // Toggle always on top
[F24:74]|   const togglePin = async () => {
[F24:75]|     await tauriWindow.setAlwaysOnTop(!isPinned);
[F24:76]|     setIsPinned(!isPinned);
[F24:77]|   };
[F24:78]| 
[F24:79]|   // Minimize window

[F24:83]| 
[F24:84]|   // Close window

[F24:87]|     // Fallback for browser mode
[F24:88]|     if (containerRef.current) {
[F24:89]|       containerRef.current.style.display = 'none';
[F24:90]|     }
[F24:91]|   };
[F24:92]| 
[F24:93]|   // Keyboard shortcut to show/hide (Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + T)

[F24:95]|     const handleKeyDown = async (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
[F24:96]|       if ((e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) && e.shiftKey && e.key === 'T') {

[F24:99]|           await tauriWindow.hide();

[F24:102]|           await tauriWindow.setFocus();
[F24:103]|         }
[F24:104]|       }
[F24:105]|     };
[F24:106]| 
[F24:107]|     window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
[F24:108]|     return () => window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);

[F25:37]| export function GlobalView({
[F25:38]|   zones,
[F25:39]|   tasks,
[F25:40]|   activeTaskId,
[F25:41]|   isTimerRunning,
[F25:42]|   onBack,
[F25:43]|   onToggleTask,
[F25:44]|   onDeleteTask,
[F25:45]|   onUpdateTask,
[F25:46]|   onToggleExpanded,
[F25:47]|   onReorderTasks,
[F25:48]|   onSelectTask,
[F25:49]| }: GlobalViewProps) {
[F25:50]|   const [showCompleted, setShowCompleted] = useState(false);
[F25:51]| 
[F25:52]|   const sensors = useSensors(
[F25:53]|     useSensor(PointerSensor),
[F25:54]|     useSensor(KeyboardSensor, {
[F25:55]|       coordinateGetter: sortableKeyboardCoordinates,
[F25:56]|     })
[F25:57]|   );
[F25:58]| 
[F25:59]|   // Get all incomplete tasks sorted by zone and order
[F25:60]|   const incompleteTasks = tasks
[F25:61]|     .filter((t) => !t.completed)
[F25:62]|     .sort((a, b) => {
[F25:63]|       const zoneA = zones.find((z) => z.id === a.zoneId);
[F25:64]|       const zoneB = zones.find((z) => z.id === b.zoneId);
[F25:65]|       if (zoneA?.order !== zoneB?.order) {
[F25:66]|         return (zoneA?.order || 0) - (zoneB?.order || 0);
[F25:67]|       }
[F25:68]|       return a.order - b.order;
[F25:69]|     });
[F25:70]| 
[F25:71]|   const completedTasks = tasks.filter((t) => t.completed);
[F25:72]| 
[F25:73]|   const handleDragEnd = (event: DragEndEvent) => {
[F25:74]|     const { active, over } = event;
[F25:75]| 
[F25:76]|     if (over && active.id !== over.id) {
[F25:77]|       const oldIndex = incompleteTasks.findIndex((t) => t.id === active.id);
[F25:78]|       const newIndex = incompleteTasks.findIndex((t) => t.id === over.id);
[F25:79]|       
[F25:80]|       if (oldIndex !== -1 && newIndex !== -1) {
[F25:81]|         const reordered = arrayMove(incompleteTasks, oldIndex, newIndex);
[F25:82]|         // Group by zone and reorder within each zone
[F25:83]|         const zoneGroups = new Map<string, Task[]>();
[F25:84]|         reordered.forEach((task) => {
[F25:85]|           if (!zoneGroups.has(task.zoneId)) {
[F25:86]|             zoneGroups.set(task.zoneId, []);
[F25:87]|           }
[F25:88]|           zoneGroups.get(task.zoneId)!.push(task);
[F25:89]|         });
[F25:90]|         
[F25:91]|         // Update order for each zone
[F25:92]|         zoneGroups.forEach((zoneTasks, zoneId) => {
[F25:93]|           onReorderTasks(zoneId, zoneTasks);
[F25:94]|         });
[F25:95]|       }
[F25:96]|     }
[F25:97]|   };
[F25:98]| 
[F25:99]|   const getZoneColor = (zoneId: string) => {
[F25:100]|     const zone = zones.find((z) => z.id === zoneId);
[F25:101]|     return zone?.color || '#6b7280';
[F25:102]|   };
[F25:103]| 
[F25:104]|   const getZoneName = (zoneId: string) => {
[F25:105]|     const zone = zones.find((z) => z.id === zoneId);
[F25:106]|     return zone?.name || 'æœªçŸ¥åˆ†åŒº';
[F25:107]|   };
[F25:108]| 
[F25:109]|   const stats = {
[F25:110]|     total: tasks.length,
[F25:111]|     completed: completedTasks.length,
[F25:112]|     pending: incompleteTasks.length,
[F25:113]|     completionRate: tasks.length > 0 ? Math.round((completedTasks.length / tasks.length) * 100) : 0,
[F25:114]|   };
[F25:115]| 
[F25:116]|   return (

[F25:140]|               <Globe size={48} className="empty-icon" />
[F25:141]|               <p>æš‚æ— ä»»åŠ¡</p>
[F25:142]|               <p className="empty-hint">åœ¨åˆ†åŒºä¸­æ·»åŠ ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¼šæ˜¾ç¤ºæ‰€æœ‰ä»»åŠ¡</p>
[F25:143]|             </div>
[F25:144]|           ) : (
[F25:145]|             <>
[F25:146]|               {/* Zone Labels for Incomplete Tasks */}
[F25:147]|               <DndContext
[F25:148]|                 sensors={sensors}
[F25:149]|                 collisionDetection={closestCenter}
[F25:150]|                 onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}

[F30:61]|   const sensors = useSensors(
[F30:62]|     useSensor(PointerSensor),
[F30:63]|     useSensor(KeyboardSensor, {
[F30:64]|       coordinateGetter: sortableKeyboardCoordinates,
[F30:65]|     })
[F30:66]|   );
[F30:67]| 
[F30:68]|   const incompleteTasks = tasks.filter((t) => !t.completed);
[F30:69]|   const completedTasks = tasks.filter((t) => t.completed);
[F30:70]| 
[F30:71]|   const handleAddTask = () => {
[F30:72]|     if (newTaskTitle.trim() && zone) {
[F30:73]|       onAddTask(zone.id, newTaskTitle.trim(), newTaskDescription.trim(), selectedPriority);
[F30:74]|       setNewTaskTitle('');
[F30:75]|       setNewTaskDescription('');
[F30:76]|       inputRef.current?.focus();
[F30:77]|     }
[F30:78]|   };
[F30:79]| 
[F30:80]|   const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
[F30:81]|     if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {
[F30:82]|       e.preventDefault();
[F30:83]|       handleAddTask();
[F30:84]|     }
[F30:85]|   };
[F30:86]| 
[F30:87]|   const handleDragEnd = (event: DragEndEvent) => {
[F30:88]|     const { active, over } = event;
[F30:89]| 
[F30:90]|     if (over && active.id !== over.id) {
[F30:91]|       const oldIndex = incompleteTasks.findIndex((t) => t.id === active.id);
[F30:92]|       const newIndex = incompleteTasks.findIndex((t) => t.id === over.id);
[F30:93]|       
[F30:94]|       if (oldIndex !== -1 && newIndex !== -1) {
[F30:95]|         const reordered = arrayMove(incompleteTasks, oldIndex, newIndex);
[F30:96]|         onReorderTasks(zone?.id || '', reordered);
[F30:97]|       }
[F30:98]|     }
[F30:99]|   };
[F30:100]| 
[F30:101]|   const getZoneColor = (zoneId: string) => {
[F30:102]|     const z = zones.find((z) => z.id === zoneId);
[F30:103]|     return z?.color || '#6b7280';
[F30:104]|   };
[F30:105]| 
[F30:106]|   const stats = {
[F30:107]|     total: tasks.length,
[F30:108]|     completed: completedTasks.length,
[F30:109]|     pending: incompleteTasks.length,
[F30:110]|     completionRate: tasks.length > 0 ? Math.round((completedTasks.length / tasks.length) * 100) : 0,
[F30:111]|   };
[F30:112]| 
[F30:113]|   if (!zone) {
[F30:114]|     return (
[F30:115]|       <div className="task-list-empty">

[F30:134]|         </div>
[F30:135]|       </div>

[F30:144]|               onClick={() => setSelectedPriority(p)}

[F30:146]|               <div className={`priority-dot ${p}`} />
[F30:147]|             </button>
[F30:148]|           ))}

[F30:166]|         </div>

[F43:75]| 
[F43:76]|   const handleKeyDown = React.useCallback(
[F43:77]|     (event: React.KeyboardEvent<HTMLDivElement>) => {
[F43:78]|       if (event.key === "ArrowLeft") {
[F43:79]|         event.preventDefault()

[F43:82]|         event.preventDefault()

[F43:86]|     [scrollPrev, scrollNext]

[F43:88]|

[F43:90]|     if (!api || !setApi) return

[F43:92]|   }, [api, setApi])
[F43:93]| 
[F43:94]|   React.useEffect(() => {
[F43:95]|     if (!api) return

[F43:97]|     api.on("reInit", onSelect)
[F43:98]|     api.on("select", onSelect)
[F43:99]| 
[F43:100]|     return () => {
[F43:101]|       api?.off("select", onSelect)
[F43:102]|     }
[F43:103]|   }, [api, onSelect])

[F43:105]|   return (
[F43:106]|     <CarouselContext.Provider
[F43:107]|       value={{
[F43:108]|         carouselRef,
[F43:109]|         api: api,
[F43:110]|         opts,

[F44:72]| const ChartStyle = ({ id, config }: { id: string; config: ChartConfig }) => {

[F44:88]| ${colorConfig

[F44:107]| function ChartTooltipContent({
[F44:108]|   active,
[F44:109]|   payload,
[F44:110]|   className,
[F44:111]|   indicator = "dot",
[F44:112]|   hideLabel = false,
[F44:113]|   hideIndicator = false,
[F44:114]|   label,
[F44:115]|   labelFormatter,
[F44:116]|   labelClassName,
[F44:117]|   formatter,
[F44:118]|   color,
[F44:119]|   nameKey,
[F44:120]|   labelKey,
[F44:121]| }: React.ComponentProps<typeof RechartsPrimitive.Tooltip> &
[F44:122]|   React.ComponentProps<"div"> & {
[F44:123]|     hideLabel?: boolean

[F44:125]|     indicator?: "line" | "dot" | "dashed"
[F44:126]|     nameKey?: string
[F44:127]|     labelKey?: string
[F44:128]|   }) {
[F44:129]|   const { config } = useChart()
[F44:130]| 
[F44:131]|   const tooltipLabel = React.useMemo(() => {
[F44:132]|     if (hideLabel || !payload?.length) {
[F44:133]|       return null
[F44:134]|     }
[F44:135]| 
[F44:136]|     const [item] = payload
[F44:137]|     const key = `${labelKey || item?.dataKey || item?.name || "value"}`
[F44:138]|     const itemConfig = getPayloadConfigFromPayload(config, item, key)
[F44:139]|     const value =
[F44:140]|       !labelKey && typeof label === "string"
[F44:141]|         ? config[label as keyof typeof config]?.label || label
[F44:142]|         : itemConfig?.label
[F44:143]| 
[F44:144]|     if (labelFormatter) {

[F44:146]|         <div className={cn("font-medium", labelClassName)}>
[F44:147]|           {labelFormatter(value, payload)}
[F44:148]|         </div>
[F44:149]|       )
[F44:150]|     }
[F44:151]| 
[F44:152]|     if (!value) {
[F44:153]|       return null
[F44:154]|     }
[F44:155]| 
[F44:156]|     return <div className={cn("font-medium", labelClassName)}>{value}</div>
[F44:157]|   }, [
[F44:158]|     label,
[F44:159]|     labelFormatter,
[F44:160]|     payload,
[F44:161]|     hideLabel,
[F44:162]|     labelClassName,
[F44:163]|     config,
[F44:164]|     labelKey,
[F44:165]|   ])
[F44:166]| 
[F44:167]|   if (!active || !payload?.length) {
[F44:168]|     return null
[F44:169]|   }
[F44:170]| 
[F44:171]|   const nestLabel = payload.length === 1 && indicator !== "dot"
[F44:172]| 
[F44:173]|   return (
[F44:174]|     <div
[F44:175]|       className={cn(
[F44:176]|         "border-border/50 bg-background grid min-w-[8rem] items-start gap-1.5 rounded-lg border px-2.5 py-1.5 text-xs shadow-xl",
[F44:177]|         className
[F44:178]|       )}
[F44:179]|     >
[F44:180]|       {!nestLabel ? tooltipLabel : null}
[F44:181]|       <div className="grid gap-1.5">
[F44:182]|         {payload
[F44:183]|           .filter((item) => item.type !== "none")
[F44:184]|           .map((item, index) => {
[F44:185]|             const key = `${nameKey || item.name || item.dataKey || "value"}`
[F44:186]|             const itemConfig = getPayloadConfigFromPayload(config, item, key)
[F44:187]|             const indicatorColor = color || item.payload.fill || item.color
[F44:188]| 
[F44:189]|             return (
[F44:190]|               <div
[F44:191]|                 key={item.dataKey}
[F44:192]|                 className={cn(
[F44:193]|                   "[&>svg]:text-muted-foreground flex w-full flex-wrap items-stretch gap-2 [&>svg]:h-2.5 [&>svg]:w-2.5",
[F44:194]|                   indicator === "dot" && "items-center"
[F44:195]|                 )}
[F44:196]|               >
[F44:197]|                 {formatter && item?.value !== undefined && item.name ? (
[F44:198]|                   formatter(item.value, item.name, item, index, item.payload)
[F44:199]|                 ) : (
[F44:200]|                   <>
[F44:201]|                     {itemConfig?.icon ? (
[F44:202]|                       <itemConfig.icon />
[F44:203]|                     ) : (
[F44:204]|                       !hideIndicator && (
[F44:205]|                         <div
[F44:206]|                           className={cn(
[F44:207]|                             "shrink-0 rounded-[2px] border-(--color-border) bg-(--color-bg)",
[F44:208]|                             {
[F44:209]|                               "h-2.5 w-2.5": indicator === "dot",
[F44:210]|                               "w-1": indicator === "line",
[F44:211]|                               "w-0 border-[1.5px] border-dashed bg-transparent":
[F44:212]|                                 indicator === "dashed",
[F44:213]|                               "my-0.5": nestLabel && indicator === "dashed",
[F44:214]|                             }
[F44:215]|                           )}
[F44:216]|                           style={
[F44:217]|                             {
[F44:218]|                               "--color-bg": indicatorColor,
[F44:219]|                               "--color-border": indicatorColor,
[F44:220]|                             } as React.CSSProperties
[F44:221]|                           }
[F44:222]|                         />
[F44:223]|                       )
[F44:224]|                     )}
[F44:225]|                     <div
[F44:226]|                       className={cn(
[F44:227]|                         "flex flex-1 justify-between leading-none",
[F44:228]|                         nestLabel ? "items-end" : "items-center"
[F44:229]|                       )}
[F44:230]|                     >
[F44:231]|                       <div className="grid gap-1.5">
[F44:232]|                         {nestLabel ? tooltipLabel : null}
[F44:233]|                         <span className="text-muted-foreground">
[F44:234]|                           {itemConfig?.label || item.name}
[F44:235]|                         </span>
[F44:236]|                       </div>
[F44:237]|                       {item.value && (
[F44:238]|                         <span className="text-foreground font-mono font-medium tabular-nums">
[F44:239]|                           {item.value.toLocaleString()}
[F44:240]|                         </span>
[F44:241]|                       )}
[F44:242]|                     </div>
[F44:243]|                   </>
[F44:244]|                 )}
[F44:245]|               </div>
[F44:246]|             )
[F44:247]|           })}
[F44:248]|       </div>
[F44:249]|     </div>
[F44:250]|   )
[F44:251]| }
[F44:252]| 
[F44:253]| const ChartLegend = RechartsPrimitive.Legend
[F44:254]| 
[F44:255]| function ChartLegendContent({
[F44:256]|   className,
[F44:257]|   hideIcon = false,
[F44:258]|   payload,
[F44:259]|   verticalAlign = "bottom",
[F44:260]|   nameKey,
[F44:261]| }: React.ComponentProps<"div"> &
[F44:262]|   Pick<RechartsPrimitive.LegendProps, "payload" | "verticalAlign"> & {
[F44:263]|     hideIcon?: boolean
[F44:264]|     nameKey?: string
[F44:265]|   }) {
[F44:266]|   const { config } = useChart()
[F44:267]| 
[F44:268]|   if (!payload?.length) {
[F44:269]|     return null
[F44:270]|   }
[F44:271]| 
[F44:272]|   return (
[F44:273]|     <div
[F44:274]|       className={cn(
[F44:275]|         "flex items-center justify-center gap-4",
[F44:276]|         verticalAlign === "top" ? "pb-3" : "pt-3",
[F44:277]|         className
[F44:278]|       )}
[F44:279]|     >
[F44:280]|       {payload
[F44:281]|         .filter((item) => item.type !== "none")
[F44:282]|         .map((item) => {
[F44:283]|           const key = `${nameKey || item.dataKey || "value"}`
[F44:284]|           const itemConfig = getPayloadConfigFromPayload(config, item, key)
[F44:285]| 
[F44:286]|           return (
[F44:287]|             <div
[F44:288]|               key={item.value}
[F44:289]|               className={cn(
[F44:290]|                 "[&>svg]:text-muted-foreground flex items-center gap-1.5 [&>svg]:h-3 [&>svg]:w-3"
[F44:291]|               )}
[F44:292]|             >
[F44:293]|               {itemConfig?.icon && !hideIcon ? (
[F44:294]|                 <itemConfig.icon />
[F44:295]|               ) : (
[F44:296]|                 <div
[F44:297]|                   className="h-2 w-2 shrink-0 rounded-[2px]"
[F44:298]|                   style={{
[F44:299]|                     backgroundColor: item.color,
[F44:300]|                   }}
[F44:301]|                 />
[F44:302]|               )}
[F44:303]|               {itemConfig?.label}
[F44:304]|             </div>
[F44:305]|           )
[F44:306]|         })}
[F44:307]|     </div>
[F44:308]|   )
[F44:309]| }
[F44:310]| 
[F44:311]| // Helper to extract item config from a payload.
[F44:312]| function getPayloadConfigFromPayload(
[F44:313]|   config: ChartConfig,
[F44:314]|   payload: unknown,
[F44:315]|   key: string
[F44:316]| ) {
[F44:317]|   if (typeof payload !== "object" || payload === null) {
[F44:318]|     return undefined
[F44:319]|   }
[F44:320]| 
[F44:321]|   const payloadPayload =
[F44:322]|     "payload" in payload &&
[F44:323]|     typeof payload.payload === "object" &&
[F44:324]|     payload.payload !== null
[F44:325]|       ? payload.payload
[F44:326]|       : undefined
[F44:327]| 
[F44:328]|   let configLabelKey: string = key
[F44:329]| 
[F44:330]|   if (
[F44:331]|     key in payload &&
[F44:332]|     typeof payload[key as keyof typeof payload] === "string"
[F44:333]|   ) {
[F44:334]|     configLabelKey = payload[key as keyof typeof payload] as string
[F44:335]|   } else if (
[F44:336]|     payloadPayload &&
[F44:337]|     key in payloadPayload &&
[F44:338]|     typeof payloadPayload[key as keyof typeof payloadPayload] === "string"
[F44:339]|   ) {
[F44:340]|     configLabelKey = payloadPayload[
[F44:341]|       key as keyof typeof payloadPayload
[F44:342]|     ] as string
[F44:343]|   }
[F44:344]| 
[F44:345]|   return configLabelKey in config
[F44:346]|     ? config[configLabelKey]
[F44:347]|     : config[key as keyof typeof config]
[F44:348]| }
[F44:349]| 
[F44:350]| export {
[F44:351]|   ChartContainer,
[F44:352]|   ChartTooltip,

[F44:357]| }

[F53:159]|   children?: React.ReactNode
[F53:160]| }) {

[F53:165]|       className={cn(

[F53:167]|         className
[F53:168]|       )}
[F53:169]|       {...props}
[F53:170]|     >
[F53:171]|       <Separator className="absolute inset-0 top-1/2" />
[F53:172]|       {children && (
[F53:173]|         <span
[F53:174]|           className="bg-background text-muted-foreground relative mx-auto block w-fit px-2"
[F53:175]|           data-slot="field-separator-content"
[F53:176]|         >
[F53:177]|           {children}
[F53:178]|         </span>
[F53:179]|       )}
[F53:180]|     </div>
[F53:181]|   )
[F53:182]| }
[F53:183]| 
[F53:184]| function FieldError({
[F53:185]|   className,
[F53:186]|   children,
[F53:187]|   errors,
[F53:188]|   ...props
[F53:189]| }: React.ComponentProps<"div"> & {
[F53:190]|   errors?: Array<{ message?: string } | undefined>
[F53:191]| }) {
[F53:192]|   const content = useMemo(() => {
[F53:193]|     if (children) {
[F53:194]|       return children
[F53:195]|     }
[F53:196]| 
[F53:197]|     if (!errors?.length) {
[F53:198]|       return null
[F53:199]|     }
[F53:200]| 
[F53:201]|     const uniqueErrors = [
[F53:202]|       ...new Map(errors.map((error) => [error?.message, error])).values(),
[F53:203]|     ]
[F53:204]| 
[F53:205]|     if (uniqueErrors?.length == 1) {
[F53:206]|       return uniqueErrors[0]?.message
[F53:207]|     }
[F53:208]| 
[F53:209]|     return (
[F53:210]|       <ul className="ml-4 flex list-disc flex-col gap-1">
[F53:211]|         {uniqueErrors.map(
[F53:212]|           (error, index) =>
[F53:213]|             error?.message && <li key={index}>{error.message}</li>
[F53:214]|         )}
[F53:215]|       </ul>
[F53:216]|     )
[F53:217]|   }, [children, errors])
[F53:218]| 
[F53:219]|   if (!content) {
[F53:220]|     return null
[F53:221]|   }
[F53:222]| 
[F53:223]|   return (
[F53:224]|     <div
[F53:225]|       role="alert"
[F53:226]|       data-slot="field-error"
[F53:227]|       className={cn("text-destructive text-sm font-normal", className)}
[F53:228]|       {...props}
[F53:229]|     >
[F53:230]|       {content}
[F53:231]|     </div>
[F53:232]|   )
[F53:233]| }
[F53:234]|

[F53:242]|   FieldSeparator,
[F53:243]|   FieldSet,

[F53:245]|   FieldTitle,
[F53:246]| }

[F73:1]| "use client"
[F73:2]| 
[F73:3]| import * as React from "react"

[F73:9]| import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
[F73:10]| import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
[F73:11]| import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"
[F73:12]| import { Separator } from "@/components/ui/separator"
[F73:13]| import {
[F73:14]|   Sheet,
[F73:15]|   SheetContent,
[F73:16]|   SheetDescription,
[F73:17]|   SheetHeader,

[F73:21]| import {
[F73:22]|   Tooltip,
[F73:23]|   TooltipContent,
[F73:24]|   TooltipProvider,
[F73:25]|   TooltipTrigger,
[F73:26]| } from "@/components/ui/tooltip"
[F73:27]| 
[F73:28]| const SIDEBAR_COOKIE_NAME = "sidebar_state"
[F73:29]| const SIDEBAR_COOKIE_MAX_AGE = 60 * 60 * 24 * 7
[F73:30]| const SIDEBAR_WIDTH = "16rem"
[F73:31]| const SIDEBAR_WIDTH_MOBILE = "18rem"
[F73:32]| const SIDEBAR_WIDTH_ICON = "3rem"
[F73:33]| const SIDEBAR_KEYBOARD_SHORTCUT = "b"
[F73:34]| 
[F73:35]| type SidebarContextProps = {
[F73:36]|   state: "expanded" | "collapsed"
[F73:37]|   open: boolean
[F73:38]|   setOpen: (open: boolean) => void
[F73:39]|   openMobile: boolean
[F73:40]|   setOpenMobile: (open: boolean) => void
[F73:41]|   isMobile: boolean
[F73:42]|   toggleSidebar: () => void
[F73:43]| }
[F73:44]| 
[F73:45]| const SidebarContext = React.createContext<SidebarContextProps | null>(null)
[F73:46]| 
[F73:47]| function useSidebar() {
[F73:48]|   const context = React.useContext(SidebarContext)
[F73:49]|   if (!context) {
[F73:50]|     throw new Error("useSidebar must be used within a SidebarProvider.")
[F73:51]|   }
[F73:52]| 
[F73:53]|   return context
[F73:54]| }
[F73:55]| 
[F73:56]| function SidebarProvider({
[F73:57]|   defaultOpen = true,
[F73:58]|   open: openProp,
[F73:59]|   onOpenChange: setOpenProp,
[F73:60]|   className,
[F73:61]|   style,
[F73:62]|   children,
[F73:63]|   ...props
[F73:64]| }: React.ComponentProps<"div"> & {
[F73:65]|   defaultOpen?: boolean
[F73:66]|   open?: boolean
[F73:67]|   onOpenChange?: (open: boolean) => void
[F73:68]| }) {
[F73:69]|   const isMobile = useIsMobile()
[F73:70]|   const [openMobile, setOpenMobile] = React.useState(false)
[F73:71]| 
[F73:72]|   // This is the internal state of the sidebar.
[F73:73]|   // We use openProp and setOpenProp for control from outside the component.
[F73:74]|   const [_open, _setOpen] = React.useState(defaultOpen)
[F73:75]|   const open = openProp ?? _open
[F73:76]|   const setOpen = React.useCallback(
[F73:77]|     (value: boolean | ((value: boolean) => boolean)) => {
[F73:78]|       const openState = typeof value === "function" ? value(open) : value
[F73:79]|       if (setOpenProp) {
[F73:80]|         setOpenProp(openState)
[F73:81]|       } else {
[F73:82]|         _setOpen(openState)
[F73:83]|       }
[F73:84]| 
[F73:85]|       // This sets the cookie to keep the sidebar state.
[F73:86]|       document.cookie = `${SIDEBAR_COOKIE_NAME}=${openState}; path=/; max-age=${SIDEBAR_COOKIE_MAX_AGE}`
[F73:87]|     },
[F73:88]|     [setOpenProp, open]
[F73:89]|   )
[F73:90]| 
[F73:91]|   // Helper to toggle the sidebar.
[F73:92]|   const toggleSidebar = React.useCallback(() => {
[F73:93]|     return isMobile ? setOpenMobile((open) => !open) : setOpen((open) => !open)
[F73:94]|   }, [isMobile, setOpen, setOpenMobile])
[F73:95]| 
[F73:96]|   // Adds a keyboard shortcut to toggle the sidebar.
[F73:97]|   React.useEffect(() => {
[F73:98]|     const handleKeyDown = (event: KeyboardEvent) => {
[F73:99]|       if (
[F73:100]|         event.key === SIDEBAR_KEYBOARD_SHORTCUT &&
[F73:101]|         (event.metaKey || event.ctrlKey)
[F73:102]|       ) {
[F73:103]|         event.preventDefault()
[F73:104]|         toggleSidebar()
[F73:105]|       }
[F73:106]|     }
[F73:107]| 
[F73:108]|     window.addEventListener("keydown", handleKeyDown)
[F73:109]|     return () => window.removeEventListener("keydown", handleKeyDown)
[F73:110]|   }, [toggleSidebar])
[F73:111]| 
[F73:112]|   // We add a state so that we can do data-state="expanded" or "collapsed".
[F73:113]|   // This makes it easier to style the sidebar with Tailwind classes.
[F73:114]|   const state = open ? "expanded" : "collapsed"
[F73:115]| 
[F73:116]|   const contextValue = React.useMemo<SidebarContextProps>(
[F73:117]|     () => ({
[F73:118]|       state,
[F73:119]|       open,
[F73:120]|       setOpen,
[F73:121]|       isMobile,
[F73:122]|       openMobile,
[F73:123]|       setOpenMobile,
[F73:124]|       toggleSidebar,
[F73:125]|     }),
[F73:126]|     [state, open, setOpen, isMobile, openMobile, setOpenMobile, toggleSidebar]
[F73:127]|   )
[F73:128]| 
[F73:129]|   return (
[F73:130]|     <SidebarContext.Provider value={contextValue}>
[F73:131]|       <TooltipProvider delayDuration={0}>
[F73:132]|         <div
[F73:133]|           data-slot="sidebar-wrapper"
[F73:134]|           style={
[F73:135]|             {
[F73:136]|               "--sidebar-width": SIDEBAR_WIDTH,
[F73:137]|               "--sidebar-width-icon": SIDEBAR_WIDTH_ICON,
[F73:138]|               ...style,
[F73:139]|             } as React.CSSProperties
[F73:140]|           }
[F73:141]|           className={cn(
[F73:142]|             "group/sidebar-wrapper has-data-[variant=inset]:bg-sidebar flex min-h-svh w-full",
[F73:143]|             className
[F73:144]|           )}
[F73:145]|           {...props}
[F73:146]|         >
[F73:147]|           {children}
[F73:148]|         </div>
[F73:149]|       </TooltipProvider>
[F73:150]|     </SidebarContext.Provider>
[F73:151]|   )
[F73:152]| }
[F73:153]| 
[F73:154]| function Sidebar({
[F73:155]|   side = "left",
[F73:156]|   variant = "sidebar",
[F73:157]|   collapsible = "offcanvas",
[F73:158]|   className,
[F73:159]|   children,
[F73:160]|   ...props
[F73:161]| }: React.ComponentProps<"div"> & {
[F73:162]|   side?: "left" | "right"
[F73:163]|   variant?: "sidebar" | "floating" | "inset"
[F73:164]|   collapsible?: "offcanvas" | "icon" | "none"
[F73:165]| }) {
[F73:166]|   const { isMobile, state, openMobile, setOpenMobile } = useSidebar()
[F73:167]| 
[F73:168]|   if (collapsible === "none") {
[F73:169]|     return (
[F73:170]|       <div
[F73:171]|         data-slot="sidebar"
[F73:172]|         className={cn(
[F73:173]|           "bg-sidebar text-sidebar-foreground flex h-full w-(--sidebar-width) flex-col",
[F73:174]|           className
[F73:175]|         )}
[F73:176]|         {...props}
[F73:177]|       >
[F73:178]|         {children}
[F73:179]|       </div>
[F73:180]|     )
[F73:181]|   }
[F73:182]| 
[F73:183]|   if (isMobile) {
[F73:184]|     return (
[F73:185]|       <Sheet open={openMobile} onOpenChange={setOpenMobile} {...props}>
[F73:186]|         <SheetContent
[F73:187]|           data-sidebar="sidebar"
[F73:188]|           data-slot="sidebar"
[F73:189]|           data-mobile="true"
[F73:190]|           className="bg-sidebar text-sidebar-foreground w-(--sidebar-width) p-0 [&>button]:hidden"
[F73:191]|           style={
[F73:192]|             {
[F73:193]|               "--sidebar-width": SIDEBAR_WIDTH_MOBILE,
[F73:194]|             } as React.CSSProperties
[F73:195]|           }
[F73:196]|           side={side}
[F73:197]|         >
[F73:198]|           <SheetHeader className="sr-only">
[F73:199]|             <SheetTitle>Sidebar</SheetTitle>
[F73:200]|             <SheetDescription>Displays the mobile sidebar.</SheetDescription>
[F73:201]|           </SheetHeader>
[F73:202]|           <div className="flex h-full w-full flex-col">{children}</div>
[F73:203]|         </SheetContent>
[F73:204]|       </Sheet>
[F73:205]|     )
[F73:206]|   }
[F73:207]| 
[F73:208]|   return (
[F73:209]|     <div
[F73:210]|       className="group peer text-sidebar-foreground hidden md:block"
[F73:211]|       data-state={state}
[F73:212]|       data-collapsible={state === "collapsed" ? collapsible : ""}
[F73:213]|       data-variant={variant}
[F73:214]|       data-side={side}
[F73:215]|       data-slot="sidebar"
[F73:216]|     >
[F73:217]|       {/* This is what handles the sidebar gap on desktop */}
[F73:218]|       <div
[F73:219]|         data-slot="sidebar-gap"
[F73:220]|         className={cn(

[F73:498]| function SidebarMenuButton({
[F73:499]|   asChild = false,

[F73:507]|   asChild?: boolean
[F73:508]|   isActive?: boolean
[F73:509]|   tooltip?: string | React.ComponentProps<typeof TooltipContent>
[F73:510]| } & VariantProps<typeof sidebarMenuButtonVariants>) {
[F73:511]|   const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
[F73:512]|   const { isMobile, state } = useSidebar()
[F73:513]|

[F73:521]|       {...props}
[F73:522]|     />

[F73:536]|     <Tooltip>
[F73:537]|       <TooltipTrigger asChild>{button}</TooltipTrigger>

[F73:539]|         side="right"

[F73:541]|         hidden={state !== "collapsed" || isMobile}
[F73:542]|         {...tooltip}

æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„: src\hooks\use-mobile.ts(F85) (çº¦åˆå¤§å°: 0 KB)

[F85:1]| import * as React from "react"
[F85:2]| 
[F85:3]| const MOBILE_BREAKPOINT = 768
[F85:4]| 
[F85:5]| export function useIsMobile() {
[F85:6]|   const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = React.useState<boolean | undefined>(undefined)
[F85:7]| 
[F85:8]|   React.useEffect(() => {
[F85:9]|     const mql = window.matchMedia(`(max-width: ${MOBILE_BREAKPOINT - 1}px)`)
[F85:10]|     const onChange = () => {
[F85:11]|       setIsMobile(window.innerWidth < MOBILE_BREAKPOINT)
[F85:12]|     }
[F85:13]|     mql.addEventListener("change", onChange)
[F85:14]|     setIsMobile(window.innerWidth < MOBILE_BREAKPOINT)
[F85:15]|     return () => mql.removeEventListener("change", onChange)
[F85:16]|   }, [])
[F85:17]| 
[F85:18]|   return !!isMobile
[F85:19]| }

[F87:1]| import { useCallback, useMemo } from 'react';
[F87:2]| import type { Task, TaskPriority } from '@/types';
[F87:3]| 
[F87:4]| export function useTasks(tasks: Task[], onUpdateTasks: (tasks: Task[]) => void) {
[F87:5]|   // Get all tasks sorted
[F87:6]|   const allTasks = useMemo(() => {
[F87:7]|     return [...tasks].sort((a, b) => a.order - b.order);
[F87:8]|   }, [tasks]);
[F87:9]| 
[F87:10]|   // Get tasks for a specific zone
[F87:11]|   const getTasksByZone = useCallback((zoneId: string) => {
[F87:12]|     return tasks
[F87:13]|       .filter((t) => t.zoneId === zoneId)
[F87:14]|       .sort((a, b) => a.order - b.order);
[F87:15]|   }, [tasks]);
[F87:16]| 
[F87:17]|   // Get incomplete tasks
[F87:18]|   const incompleteTasks = useMemo(() => {
[F87:19]|     return tasks.filter((t) => !t.completed);
[F87:20]|   }, [tasks]);
[F87:21]| 
[F87:22]|   // Get completed tasks
[F87:23]|   const completedTasks = useMemo(() => {
[F87:24]|     return tasks.filter((t) => t.completed);
[F87:25]|   }, [tasks]);
[F87:26]| 
[F87:27]|   // Add a new task
[F87:28]|   const addTask = useCallback((
[F87:29]|     zoneId: string,
[F87:30]|     title: string,
[F87:31]|     description: string = '',
[F87:32]|     priority: TaskPriority = 'medium'
[F87:33]|   ) => {
[F87:34]|     const zoneTasks = getTasksByZone(zoneId);
[F87:35]|     const maxOrder = zoneTasks.length > 0 ? Math.max(...zoneTasks.map((t) => t.order)) : -1;
[F87:36]|     
[F87:37]|     const newTask: Task = {
[F87:38]|       id: `task-${Date.now()}`,
[F87:39]|       zoneId,
[F87:40]|       title: title.trim(),
[F87:41]|       description: description.trim(),
[F87:42]|       completed: false,
[F87:43]|       priority,
[F87:44]|       order: maxOrder + 1,
[F87:45]|       createdAt: Date.now(),
[F87:46]|       expanded: false,
[F87:47]|       totalWorkTime: 0,
[F87:48]|     };
[F87:49]|     onUpdateTasks([...tasks, newTask]);
[F87:50]|     return newTask.id;
[F87:51]|   }, [tasks, getTasksByZone, onUpdateTasks]);
[F87:52]| 
[F87:53]|   // Toggle task completion
[F87:54]|   const toggleTask = useCallback((id: string) => {
[F87:55]|     onUpdateTasks(
[F87:56]|       tasks.map((task) =>
[F87:57]|         task.id === id
[F87:58]|           ? { ...task, completed: !task.completed, completedAt: !task.completed ? Date.now() : undefined }
[F87:59]|           : task
[F87:60]|       )
[F87:61]|     );
[F87:62]|   }, [tasks, onUpdateTasks]);
[F87:63]| 
[F87:64]|   // Delete a task
[F87:65]|   const deleteTask = useCallback((id: string) => {
[F87:66]|     onUpdateTasks(tasks.filter((task) => task.id !== id));
[F87:67]|   }, [tasks, onUpdateTasks]);
[F87:68]| 
[F87:69]|   // Update task
[F87:70]|   const updateTask = useCallback((id: string, updates: Partial<Omit<Task, 'id'>>) => {
[F87:71]|     onUpdateTasks(
[F87:72]|       tasks.map((task) =>
[F87:73]|         task.id === id ? { ...task, ...updates } : task
[F87:74]|       )
[F87:75]|     );
[F87:76]|   }, [tasks, onUpdateTasks]);
[F87:77]| 
[F87:78]|   // Toggle task expanded state
[F87:79]|   const toggleExpanded = useCallback((id: string) => {
[F87:80]|     onUpdateTasks(
[F87:81]|       tasks.map((task) =>
[F87:82]|         task.id === id ? { ...task, expanded: !task.expanded } : task
[F87:83]|       )
[F87:84]|     );
[F87:85]|   }, [tasks, onUpdateTasks]);
[F87:86]| 
[F87:87]|   // Set task priority
[F87:88]|   const setTaskPriority = useCallback((id: string, priority: TaskPriority) => {
[F87:89]|     onUpdateTasks(
[F87:90]|       tasks.map((task) =>
[F87:91]|         task.id === id ? { ...task, priority } : task
[F87:92]|       )
[F87:93]|     );
[F87:94]|   }, [tasks, onUpdateTasks]);
[F87:95]| 
[F87:96]|   // Move task to different zone
[F87:97]|   const moveTaskToZone = useCallback((taskId: string, newZoneId: string) => {
[F87:98]|     const targetZoneTasks = getTasksByZone(newZoneId);
[F87:99]|     const maxOrder = targetZoneTasks.length > 0 ? Math.max(...targetZoneTasks.map((t) => t.order)) : -1;
[F87:100]|     
[F87:101]|     onUpdateTasks(
[F87:102]|       tasks.map((task) =>
[F87:103]|         task.id === taskId ? { ...task, zoneId: newZoneId, order: maxOrder + 1 } : task
[F87:104]|       )
[F87:105]|     );
[F87:106]|   }, [tasks, getTasksByZone, onUpdateTasks]);
[F87:107]| 
[F87:108]|   // Reorder tasks within a zone
[F87:109]|   const reorderTasks = useCallback((zoneId: string, newOrder: Task[]) => {
[F87:110]|     const otherTasks = tasks.filter((t) => t.zoneId !== zoneId);
[F87:111]|     const reorderedTasks = newOrder.map((task, index) => ({
[F87:112]|       ...task,
[F87:113]|       order: index,
[F87:114]|     }));
[F87:115]|     onUpdateTasks([...otherTasks, ...reorderedTasks]);
[F87:116]|   }, [tasks, onUpdateTasks]);
[F87:117]| 
[F87:118]|   // Clear completed tasks
[F87:119]|   const clearCompleted = useCallback(() => {
[F87:120]|     onUpdateTasks(tasks.filter((task) => !task.completed));
[F87:121]|   }, [tasks, onUpdateTasks]);
[F87:122]| 
[F87:123]|   // Get task stats
[F87:124]|   const stats = useMemo(() => {
[F87:125]|     const total = tasks.length;
[F87:126]|     const completed = tasks.filter((t) => t.completed).length;
[F87:127]|     const pending = total - completed;
[F87:128]|     const highPriority = tasks.filter((t) => t.priority === 'high' && !t.completed).length;
[F87:129]|     
[F87:130]|     return {
[F87:131]|       total,
[F87:132]|       completed,
[F87:133]|       pending,
[F87:134]|       highPriority,
[F87:135]|       completionRate: total > 0 ? Math.round((completed / total) * 100) : 0,
[F87:136]|     };
[F87:137]|   }, [tasks]);
[F87:138]| 
[F87:139]|   // Get stats for a specific zone
[F87:140]|   const getZoneStats = useCallback((zoneId: string) => {
[F87:141]|     const zoneTasks = getTasksByZone(zoneId);
[F87:142]|     const total = zoneTasks.length;
[F87:143]|     const completed = zoneTasks.filter((t) => t.completed).length;
[F87:144]|     const pending = total - completed;
[F87:145]|     
[F87:146]|     return {
[F87:147]|       total,
[F87:148]|       completed,
[F87:149]|       pending,
[F87:150]|       completionRate: total > 0 ? Math.round((completed / total) * 100) : 0,
[F87:151]|     };
[F87:152]|   }, [getTasksByZone]);
[F87:153]| 
[F87:154]|   return {
[F87:155]|     tasks: allTasks,
[F87:156]|     getTasksByZone,
[F87:157]|     incompleteTasks,
[F87:158]|     completedTasks,
[F87:159]|     addTask,
[F87:160]|     toggleTask,
[F87:161]|     deleteTask,
[F87:162]|     updateTask,
[F87:163]|     toggleExpanded,
[F87:164]|     setTaskPriority,

[F87:166]|     reorderTasks,
[F87:167]|     clearCompleted,
[F87:168]|     stats,
[F87:169]|     getZoneStats,
[F87:170]|   };
[F87:171]| }

[F88:262]|     if (state.mode === 'work') {
[F88:263]|       const nextMode = (completedSessions + 1) % 4 === 0 ? 'longBreak' : 'break';
[F88:264]|       const nextDuration = nextMode === 'longBreak' ? longBreakDuration : breakDuration;
[F88:265]|       tickCountRef.current = 0;
[F88:266]|       setState({
[F88:267]|         mode: nextMode,
[F88:268]|         timeRemaining: nextDuration,
[F88:269]|         isRunning: autoStartBreak,
[F88:270]|         currentTaskId: null,
[F88:271]|         currentSessionStartTime: autoStartBreak ? Date.now() : undefined,
[F88:272]|       });
[F88:273]|       if (autoStartBreak) {
[F88:274]|         start(nextMode);
[F88:275]|       }
[F88:276]|     } else {
[F88:277]|       setState({
[F88:278]|         mode: 'idle',
[F88:279]|         timeRemaining: workDuration,
[F88:280]|         isRunning: false,
[F88:281]|         currentTaskId: null,
[F88:282]|         currentSessionStartTime: undefined,
[F88:283]|       });
[F88:284]|     }
[F88:285]|   }, [state.mode, completedSessions, workDuration, breakDuration, longBreakDuration, autoStartBreak, start, clearIntervalSafe]);
[F88:286]| 
[F88:287]|   const updateTime = useCallback((newTimeInSeconds: number) => {
[F88:288]|     setState(prev => ({
[F88:289]|       ...prev,
[F88:290]|       timeRemaining: newTimeInSeconds,
[F88:291]|     }));
[F88:292]|   }, []);
[F88:293]| 
[F88:294]|   const formatTime = useCallback((seconds: number): string => {
[F88:295]|     const mins = Math.floor(seconds / 60);
[F88:296]|     const secs = seconds % 60;
[F88:297]|     return `${mins.toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${secs.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
[F88:298]|   }, []);
[F88:299]| 
[F88:300]|   return {
[F88:301]|     ...state,
[F88:302]|     formattedTime: formatTime(state.timeRemaining),
[F88:303]|     completedSessions,
[F88:304]|     start,
[F88:305]|     pause,
[F88:306]|     resume,
[F88:307]|     stop,
[F88:308]|     reset,
[F88:309]|     skip,
[F88:310]|     updateTime,
[F88:311]|     progress: state.mode === 'work'
[F88:312]|       ? ((workDuration - state.timeRemaining) / workDuration) * 100
[F88:313]|       : state.mode === 'break'
[F88:314]|       ? ((breakDuration - state.timeRemaining) / breakDuration) * 100
[F88:315]|       : state.mode === 'longBreak'
[F88:316]|       ? ((longBreakDuration - state.timeRemaining) / longBreakDuration) * 100
[F88:317]|       : 0,
[F88:318]|   };
[F88:319]| }

æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„: src\hooks\useZones.ts(F89) (çº¦åˆå¤§å°: 3 KB)

[F89:1]| import { useCallback, useMemo } from 'react';
[F89:2]| import type { Zone, Task } from '@/types';
[F89:3]| import { PREDEFINED_TEMPLATES } from '@/types';
[F89:4]| 
[F89:5]| export function useZones(
[F89:6]|   zones: Zone[],
[F89:7]|   tasks: Task[],
[F89:8]|   onUpdateZones: (zones: Zone[]) => void,
[F89:9]|   onUpdateTasks: (tasks: Task[]) => void
[F89:10]| ) {
[F89:11]|   // Get zones sorted by order
[F89:12]|   const sortedZones = useMemo(() => {
[F89:13]|     return [...zones].sort((a, b) => a.order - b.order);
[F89:14]|   }, [zones]);
[F89:15]| 
[F89:16]|   // Get tasks for a specific zone
[F89:17]|   const getZoneTasks = useCallback((zoneId: string) => {
[F89:18]|     return tasks
[F89:19]|       .filter((t) => t.zoneId === zoneId)
[F89:20]|       .sort((a, b) => a.order - b.order);
[F89:21]|   }, [tasks]);
[F89:22]| 
[F89:23]|   // Add a new zone
[F89:24]|   const addZone = useCallback((name: string, color: string) => {
[F89:25]|     const maxOrder = zones.length > 0 ? Math.max(...zones.map((z) => z.order)) : -1;
[F89:26]|     const newZone: Zone = {
[F89:27]|       id: Date.now().toString(),
[F89:28]|       name: name.trim(),
[F89:29]|       color,
[F89:30]|       order: maxOrder + 1,
[F89:31]|       createdAt: Date.now(),
[F89:32]|     };
[F89:33]|     onUpdateZones([...zones, newZone]);
[F89:34]|     return newZone.id;
[F89:35]|   }, [zones, onUpdateZones]);
[F89:36]| 
[F89:37]|   // Update a zone
[F89:38]|   const updateZone = useCallback((id: string, updates: Partial<Omit<Zone, 'id'>>) => {
[F89:39]|     onUpdateZones(
[F89:40]|       zones.map((zone) =>
[F89:41]|         zone.id === id ? { ...zone, ...updates } : zone
[F89:42]|       )
[F89:43]|     );
[F89:44]|   }, [zones, onUpdateZones]);
[F89:45]| 
[F89:46]|   // Delete a zone
[F89:47]|   const deleteZone = useCallback((id: string) => {
[F89:48]|     // Move all tasks from this zone to the default zone or delete them
[F89:49]|     const remainingZones = zones.filter((z) => z.id !== id);
[F89:50]|     if (remainingZones.length === 0) {
[F89:51]|       // Create a default zone if no zones left
[F89:52]|       const defaultZone: Zone = {
[F89:53]|         id: 'default',
[F89:54]|         name: 'é»˜è®¤',
[F89:55]|         color: '#3b82f6',
[F89:56]|         order: 0,
[F89:57]|         createdAt: Date.now(),
[F89:58]|       };
[F89:59]|       onUpdateZones([defaultZone]);
[F89:60]|       // Move tasks to default zone
[F89:61]|       onUpdateTasks(tasks.map((t) => (t.zoneId === id ? { ...t, zoneId: 'default' } : t)));
[F89:62]|     } else {
[F89:63]|       onUpdateZones(remainingZones);
[F89:64]|       // Delete tasks in the deleted zone
[F89:65]|       onUpdateTasks(tasks.filter((t) => t.zoneId !== id));
[F89:66]|     }
[F89:67]|   }, [zones, tasks, onUpdateZones, onUpdateTasks]);
[F89:68]| 
[F89:69]|   // Reorder zones
[F89:70]|   const reorderZones = useCallback((newOrder: Zone[]) => {
[F89:71]|     const updatedZones = newOrder.map((zone, index) => ({
[F89:72]|       ...zone,
[F89:73]|       order: index,
[F89:74]|     }));
[F89:75]|     onUpdateZones(updatedZones);
[F89:76]|   }, [onUpdateZones]);
[F89:77]| 
[F89:78]|   // Apply a template
[F89:79]|   const applyTemplate = useCallback((templateId: string) => {
[F89:80]|     const template = PREDEFINED_TEMPLATES.find((t) => t.id === templateId);
[F89:81]|     if (!template) return;
[F89:82]| 
[F89:83]|     // Create new zones from template
[F89:84]|     const newZones: Zone[] = template.zones.map((zone, index) => ({
[F89:85]|       id: `zone-${Date.now()}-${index}`,
[F89:86]|       name: zone.name,
[F89:87]|       color: zone.color,
[F89:88]|       order: index,
[F89:89]|       createdAt: Date.now(),
[F89:90]|     }));
[F89:91]| 
[F89:92]|     onUpdateZones(newZones);
[F89:93]|     onUpdateTasks([]); // Clear tasks for new workspace
[F89:94]|   }, [onUpdateZones, onUpdateTasks]);
[F89:95]| 
[F89:96]|   // Get zone by id
[F89:97]|   const getZoneById = useCallback((id: string) => {
[F89:98]|     return zones.find((z) => z.id === id);
[F89:99]|   }, [zones]);
[F89:100]| 
[F89:101]|   return {
[F89:102]|     zones: sortedZones,
[F89:103]|     getZoneTasks,
[F89:104]|     addZone,
[F89:105]|     updateZone,
[F89:106]|     deleteZone,
[F89:107]|     reorderZones,
[F89:108]|     applyTemplate,
[F89:109]|     getZoneById,
[F89:110]|     templates: PREDEFINED_TEMPLATES,
[F89:111]|   };
[F89:112]| }

[F91:167]| export function formatDuration(seconds: number): string {
[F91:168]|   const hours = Math.floor(seconds / 3600);
[F91:169]|   const mins = Math.floor((seconds % 3600) / 60);
[F91:170]|   
[F91:171]|   if (hours > 0) {
[F91:172]|     return `${hours}h ${mins}m`;
[F91:173]|   }
[F91:174]|   return `${mins}m`;
[F91:175]| }

[F91:177]| // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´ä¸ºè¯¦ç»†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
[F91:178]| export function formatDurationDetailed(seconds: number): string {
[F91:179]|   const hours = Math.floor(seconds / 3600);
[F91:180]|   const mins = Math.floor((seconds % 3600) / 60);
[F91:181]|   const secs = seconds % 60;
[F91:182]|   
[F91:183]|   if (hours > 0) {
[F91:184]|     return `${hours}å°æ—¶ ${mins}åˆ† ${secs}ç§’`;

[F91:187]|     return `${mins}åˆ† ${secs}ç§’`;
[F91:188]|   }
[F91:189]|   return `${secs}ç§’`;
